stimulusHtml: Stratospheric ozone (O3) is essential for life to exist on Earth because it
choicesHtml: absorbs incoming visible light from the Sun, increasing rates of photosynthesis
reflects incoming visible light from the Sun back into space, increasing rates of cellular respiration
absorbs incoming solar UV-C radiation, preventing exposure to dangerous radiation from the Sun
reflects incoming solar UV-C radiation back into space, decreasing the average temperature in terrestrial biomes
